Although you played the cnet version, you 
really should purchase the full game.  The
chances are that you will be very, very 
happy with your purchase. Just think of
everything you will get for only $10!  It's
really hard to find out how to order, sadly.
 Actually, I think the Gladiator website has
 gone under, so I'm not sure where you can
 order now.  Good luck, though!
